LanguageData.Plant_SSMorelMush.label: Morel Mushroom
LanguageData.Plant_SSMorelMush.description: This delicate mushroom can be found in the wild and grown in hydroponics.
LanguageData.SSMorel.label: Morel Mushroom
LanguageData.SSMorel.description: Raw morel mushrooms, they have a distinctive flavour highly prized by gourmets and act as a meat substitute.
